programme.desc: A rancher (John Mack Brown) makes his cousin (John Wayne) trail boss on a cattle drive headed for trouble.

programme.title: Wind River
programme.desc: Cory Lambert is a wildlife officer who finds the body of a teenager on an American Indian reservation in snowy Wyoming. Teaming up with an FBI agent, the duo soon find that their lives are in danger while trying to solve the mystery of her death.

programme.desc: A lawman (Dwight Yoakam) protecting a small Southwestern town wants revenge on a family of troublemakers that earlier disgraced him.

programme.desc: Framed for murder, a gunman (Eric Braeden) seeks revenge against his family's killers.

programme.desc: A blacksmith's daughter helps two lawmen round up a group of cattle rustlers.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Hoss and Little Joe spend a most unforgettable night at the carnival when Little Joe's date disappears.

programme.desc: A sheriff's daughter runs off with her boyfriend (John Ericson), unaware he is a murderous bank robber.

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: When Mexican revolutionary Juan Morales plans to topple the Mexican government, Travis takes up the disguise of a gun smuggler to stop him.

programme.desc: Jim learns that a slave he had freed has been recaptured and is about to be sold at a slave auction.

programme.desc: Jim is distracted by a beautiful woman while traveling to New Orleans to buy an estate.

programme.desc: Jim sets out to find the thief who stole the Christmas gift he purchased for his mother.

programme.desc: After his rifle misfires during a close encounter with a bear, Jim approaches a blacksmith to suggest a different kind of knife.
